p: By using the Sawyers dataset [ 55] within the R2: Genomics Analysis and Visualization Platform ( http://r2.amc.nl http://r2platform.com accessed on 19 December 2020) website, we demonstrated upregulations of TMEM45B, FBOX6, and SRD5A3 in mPCs compared to primary PCs along with downregulations of NANS, LY75, and ARFGEF2 in mPCs in comparison to primary PCs ( Figure 3B).
